item.title: Show HN：我制作了AI工具，将个人记忆转化为风格化的肖像
item.description:
I built WishPainted — a solo project that uses AI to turn personal photos into stylized portraits (watercolor, LEGO, Ghibli-like, and more).It’s browser-based, no login required, and meant for creating visual keepsakes or gifts.Happy to hear feedback, especially around image quality, UX, or style suggestions.
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=43924416 点：2 ＃评论：0
